{{Wireless embedded system |brand=D-Link |model=DIR-822 |revision=D1 |asin= |series=AC1200 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Shenzhen MTN Electronics |manuf_model=
MTO-WR1200AC |manuf_rev=F-D (A0) |fcc_date=04/05/2018 |fcc_id=KA2IR1210A1 |ic_id=4216A-IR822D1 |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FN |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q64VSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Realtek |ram1_model=RTL8197FN |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FN |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BR;RTL8812BRH, H2L13P3 GH17; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin }} {{TagLine|AC1200 Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://us.dlink.com/en/products/dir-822-d-link-wifi-router-ac1200-dual-band}} (US) {{â€¢}} [http://www.dlink.ru/ru/products/5/2353.html Product page] (RU) "DIR-822 Rev.D1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. FCC documents suggest that the [[D-Link DIR-1210 rev A1]] is identical :and they "only differ in model name due to marketing purpose." The CPU is probably either a [[Realtek]] RTL8197FN (or RTL8197FNT) :but the exact ID is not legible in the FCC internal photos.
